name: factories
description:
for my upcoming automation game (Conveyor belts yeah!) with some colony concept.
I am at a stage in the development where I spent some much times on my game, I can't see the flaws anymore. So I need your feedbacks to improve the gameplay/controls.

The game will receive a weekly update with a bunch of fix and new gameplay features.

You can also request a Steam key to download it directly through Steam, at contact[at]martinjules.com
